title: Which is more popular, Samsung or Apple? - Quora

response.answer_text: Apple for sure, its the only company in smartphone world which have dedicated R&D for its OS… The software / apps launched in Apple store are tested on each model of apple devices that are currently sold by apple to bring out the best experience. Samsung would be nowhere around competition if it didnt adopted android ecosystem. Google test android apps and new OS only on its pixel devices or devices which comes under android one program. So vendors like samsung doesnt have much option other then to optimise the software in there own research wing…
